Statement: DEL-05-07 implements scope item SOW-0506: FF&E treated as $20k cash allowance; DB to allocate and manage within allowance.
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Datasheet Identification table and Decomposition Phase 6 traceability (SOW-0506 -> DEL-05-07).

TargetName: Transparent separable pricing for optional scope items
Statement: DEL-05-07 supports OBJ-010: Provide transparent separable pricing for optional scope items.
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in Datasheet Identification table and Decomposition Phase 5 deliverable table (DEL-05-07 SupportsObjectives = OBJ-010). Guidance confirms OBJ-010 linkage via SOW-0506 in Decomposition traceability matrix.

TargetName: Addendum 03 section 1.18 -- FF&E as additional item directive
Statement: Addendum 03 section 1.18 directs that FF&E shall be included as an additional item separate from base costs to enable accurate construction cost evaluation.
Notes: FACT. Addendum 03 s1.18 confirmed in PDF: "FF&E can be included as an additional item in the proposal but should not be included in the base costs." Datasheet identifies this as the Governing Source.

Statement: DEL-05-07 requires scope boundary coordination with DEL-05-06 to prevent double-counting of freestanding kitchen appliances in the FF&E allowance boundary definition.
EvidenceQuote: Coordination with DEL-05-06 (Appliances & Laundry) to prevent scope overlap in the FF&E boundary definition
Notes: FACT. Procedure Prerequisites explicitly require coordination with DEL-05-06. Guidance CON-002 documents the scope overlap conflict (appliances vs FF&E boundary). Specification REQ-05 verification requires addressing appliance overlap with DEL-05-06.
